title: Perma-Bans
body:
No amount of perma-bans will make shitty players any less shitty.

Shitty players make others rage at them, by virtue of being shitty.

It's just a fact of life. The everyone gets a trophy mentality is a joke, and these are the kind(s) of people who won't ever succeed in life. Criticism is a necessary part of life.

Also, when I figured out it was easier to spend $20 on new account then spend $ on rp for champs/boosts, I stopped paying riot a dime. EBAY ftw. Getting refunded all my old RP purchases through paypal was also a snap. Remember kids, there is always a recourse. Riot is shooting themselves in the foot with the new system. Perma-bans for trivial stuff? Lol. The money train is going to grind to a halt when people realize all their crap can be taken from them. If you don't want negative attitudes in your games, remove negative players' chat capabilities. The reality remains, however, that no amount of negativity makes them any less skilled at the game, and shitty players SHOULD feel shitty for ruining the game for their four other teammates - which is where the vast majority of negativity comes from in the game from the first place.

Because your "obvious statements" are mostly obviously wrong. So obviously, that nobody can be bothered to explain it to you, because it would most likely be fruitless. After all you managed to be wrong about:

A) The nature of the actual problem; given that you seem to try to shift the blame to people that are bad at playing a video game instead of to the people that lack self control. Also see H).
B) The point of games as a whole, seeing as how you are trying to justify people raging at the bad players mentioned above.
C) The concept of trophies, seeing as how not being raged at is apparently a "trophy" of some kind to you.
D) Sensible use of money, given that you think that buying accounts (which will quickly get banned **and** are very frequently used to scam people) for 20$ is a good idea.
E) The frequency of permabans **or** the amount of people that are upset about the existence of permabans seeing as how you think that people like you refraining from buying RP will make even a dent in Riot's income.
F) How logical conclusions work, seeing as how you desperately tried to shift the blame to the shitty players, yet say that negative players should simply get their chat restricted.
G) The general idea of a teambased game (and again, the frequency of permabans), seeing as how you seem to believe that it makes any sense whatsoever to remove a really really small portion of the players' ability to chat at all, just so they can keep playing the game without having to adjust to playing with other human beings.
H) The concept of guilt, seeing as how you seem to believe that players that have absolutely no control over who they get matched with, should somehow feel shitty for not being matched at their appropriate skill level.
I) The concept of skill, seeing as how you seem to believe that magically any person that ragers is a skilled player; or even a more skilled player than the person being raged at, when in reality raging very frequently origins from our instinct to protect ourselves from responsibility.

I hope that clears things up.

A) Whether anyone has self control or not is completely irrelevant to terrible players being flamebait, IE: the ROOT of the problem.

B) The point is to win. Anything that lowers the chances of that, IE: terrible players, feeders, trolls, etc, reduces your chance of winning, and thus detracts from the game experience.

C) Trophies? What?

D) Very sensible. Cheap, reliable, my time (and sanity dealing with terrible noobs in sub-30) is worth well more then the cost

E) The frequency is changing, immensely.

F) Where is the desperation? Remove the terribles, or create a noob server for them to play on so as not to ruin others' experience (and even transfer off of). Otherwise, guess what, if someone is terrible and playing poorly, they should be told that they are playing poorly, and ruining others' experience.... see B

G) The general idea is to win. Anything else is wrong.

H) Guilt is irrelevant to winning, and a feelings trophy won't make a terrible player better.

I) Are you implying that feeders and terribles aren't the cause of 95%+ of the rage in LoL? Because you're categorically delusional if that's that point you're trying to make.
